13799.<pc>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－参の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The copy of 'Choten Yugi: Book Three' in your
possession began to glow!

13800.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。\n<pc>は その文字を読んだ。:
The blank pages are now filled with words.
<pc> began reading them.

13801.なんじゃ ここも見つかってしまったか。\n……まあよいわ。修行の続きといくぞ。\:
So you found this place, too? ...Oh well. Let us continue your training. Let's give a shock to the martial artist who relies on weapons
too much!

13802.この辺りをうろつく魔物 <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を\n素手で 倒してくる:
You must defeat a Trickstar, a monster
that roams this area, with your bare hands. No
weapons or shields are allowed!

13803.それと 聞きあきたかもしれんが 素手で倒したら\nその戦いを勝って終わらせなけれ:
And in case you're not tired of hearing this, once you pummel them to death with your bare hands, you have to win the fight for it to
count. So get out there and defeat <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of them!

13804.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「や:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>As I suspected... it was you, not Master Yarn,
who was completing the training.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13805.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「先:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I apologize for not greeting you properly the

13806.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「き:

13808.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「私:

13809.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「い: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>No, excuse me... we will see each other again.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13854.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「<:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>It is my fault that <pc> makes such a

13855.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ガ:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Gaurad? What are you talking about?

13856.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「私:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>If I brought you the next book, it would be
<pc>, not you, who would complete

13857.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「あ: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Ahh～, looks like I've been found out.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13858.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>You are a legendary martial artist, the only

13859.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「だ:

13860.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「そ:

13861.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「何:

13862.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「悪:

13863.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ア:

13864.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「そ:

13865.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ま: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Mistaken? What do you mean, involved?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13866.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>If this continues, they will die.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13867.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「は: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Huh? Why do you say that?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13868.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「次:

13869.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「だ:

13870.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「そ:

13871.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「参:

13872.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「そ:

13873.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「行:

24451.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「責:
